text: Steph Bowe (1 February 1994 – 20 January 2020) was an Australian novelist and blogger. She published three young adult novels between 2010 and 2017, while her blog, which she began at age 15, received about 12,000 hits per month. Bowe was diagnosed with T-lymphoblastic lymphoma in April 2019, and died from the condition on 20 January 2020. She was 25 years old. == Bibliography == *Girl Saves Boy (2010) *All This Could End (2013) *Night Swimming (2017) ==References== ==External links== *Official website Category:Australian women writers Category:1994 births Category:2020 deaths Category:21st-century Australian women
title: Steph Bowe
